articles.title: The Taliban is already inspiring terror beyond Afghanistan. It will only spread - Economic Times
articles.description: Expect the immediate danger to be regional — in South and Central Asia — as geography and capability limit the initial damage. Chinese interests in Pakistan have already taken a hit.
